Several epidemiological studies conducted in the USSR during the 1970s appeared to establish that Eleutherococcus root extract, given prophylactically, can reduce morbidity rates during an influenza virus epidemic as well as typical complications of influenza infection, such as bronchitis, pneumonia, and otitis.
